resources.string: Bournvita is available 500g in plastic box. From here you can buy a bundle of Bournvita, In one Cartoon of Bornvita 15 box of 500g which will contain.
Cadbury Celebration Silk Chocolate which weighs 233g. You will get 12 bars in a box, each price of which is Rs 275.
Cadbury Chocolate Shots This pack contains 208gm. There are 12 chocolate packets in one packet. Which combines 12 packets to form one packet, 48 such packets will be found in 1 cartoon.
Cadbury Dairy Milk Fruit & Nut Chocolate Bar whose weight is 36gm, which is mixed 9 times to make one packet. We make a cartoon by mixing 40 such packets.
